numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Some younger people are 15 years old or older and 24 years old or younger.
2. These younger people are more optimistic than older people about the world becoming a better place.
4. I wonder why older people disagree with younger people about the world becoming a better place.
5. This difference relates to me and my community.
6. Many people of my age agree with me that the world will become a better place.
8. These older people say that the world used to be better.
9. These older people say that the world is becoming worse.
10. Younger generations are optimistic about making the world a better place.
